message: Does anyone know of a great resource for small quantities of quality promo shirts? I'm talking like 10 or so at a time.
@jwwest Have you tried spreadshirt? We're using it as a store (http://tarpipe.spreadshirt.net/) and when we need giveaways we buy the t-shirts ourselves.

Spreadshirt are good, I've used them too, and can +1 what @bpedro said. Zazzle also seem to be pretty good; they create a broader range of things and integrate with Facebook well. Cafépress also make a broad range of things, but their business ethic seems to be much looser than that of the former two.
Zazzle has worked for me in the past: http://goo.gl/1zCkP
